title: Ho la mie che e uscita difettoso che dopo 1 mese si e rotta
body: Il caffè e buono ma sono rimasto un po deluso lo usata si e no un mese e poi si e spenta e non a piu funzionato
author: Egidio
date: Revisado en Italia el 15 de octubre de 2023

title: Horrible plastic tasting coffee
body:
Plastic flavour-horrible
So I’ve run several tanks of water through ... made no difference.
Tried a coffee machine cleaning tablet, left in tank overnight then ran 3 tanks of water through ...
coffee is undrinkable...
I mean this is crazy... why am I having to do this ?
Surely the machine should be producing nice tasting coffee by now
Tried clearing machine through with vinegar to remove plastic taste... worked for a day... now it’s back to plastic.
Given up and returned machine to Amazon
Purchased a Krups mini me... and coffee is lovely
author: R. Fox
date: Revisado en Reino Unido el 26 de octubre de 2020

title: Semplicemente assurdo
body:
Acquistato una volta, ricevuto imballo semi distrutto, serbatoio dell'acqua danneggiato e piattino porta tazza mancante.

Reso immediato, acquisto una seconda volta, perchè pensavo fosse solo sfortuna, arriva imballata perfettamente, la apro, la monto e manca il porta capsule, pezzo fondamentale per il funzionamento.

Situazione ridicola, sono molto deluso.

Ovviamente secondo reso, e servizio impeccabile da parte di amazon.
author: Emanuele David
date: Revisado en Italia el 9 de mayo de 2023

title: La seconda che compro
body: Dopo neanche 2 mesi non funziona più ed è la seconda volta che l'acquisto.
author: MONICA
date: Revisado en Italia el 28 de agosto de 2023

title: Awful Plastic taste to coffee
body: Have run hot and cold water through the machine about 20 times and still horrible plastic taste to the coffee. I've had 4 dolce gusto machines before this and never had this problem. Thought it might just be the De'Longhi model but reading the Krups reviews seems lots of people complaining of the same over there. Hate to think what is leaching into the coffee to give it such a awful taste.
author: M. A. E
date: Revisado en Reino Unido el 20 de marzo de 2021

title: It doesn’t turn on and pour.
body: I disliked this product because it wouldn’t pour when pressed. Waste of time and money!
author: Anne Marie Rogers
date: Revisado en Reino Unido el 13 de agosto de 2022

title: Not as good as old machine
body: Can't fit a latte glass under it unless you remove the drip tray, which defeats the object. Also got a strange plug on the machine, very difficult to grip to remove from plug socket. Makes good coffee though.
author: J Skelt
date: Revisado en Reino Unido el 11 de enero de 2021

title: I cannot be judgemental.
body: I have know view at this time to this products as mine arrived with a leaking water container. So I have know idea of it’s ability to perform.
author: John Antoine
date: Revisado en Reino Unido el 27 de junio de 2021

title: Tastes like plastic
body:
I wish I had read the 1 star reviews before buying.
Impossible to remove the plastic taste, despite vigorous cleaning.
Not had this problem with the two other Dolce Gusto machines I own.

date: Revisado en Reino Unido el 27 de marzo de 2021

title: Purtroppo ho ricevuto la macchinetta e dopo pochi giorni risultava essere difettosa
body: Il caffe viene fuori molto leggero, ma tutte le macchinette con capsule sono cost

title: Poor
body: Didn’t last long , got a replacement hope it lasts a little longer.

title: Waste of money
body: It was good at mixing but only Luke warm cuppa definitely not worth money so dissatisfied

date: Revisado en Reino Unido el 15 de septiembre de 2021

title: Venia abierto
body: Bastante mal....viene abierta y la devolví pensando que era problema del repartidor y vuelve igual....abierta.
author: Ana
date: Revisado en España el 25 de octubre de 2023

title: Nice and compact
body: This is a nice looking machine and is quite compact - unfortunately i had to send mine back as it had a leak near the power cord
author: Lainey
date: Revisado en Reino Unido el 7 de febrero de 2024

title: Lightweight and Lacking in Basic Features
body: I was maybe unlucky but the first machine I received had marks on the outer casing so was sent back. The second one was received promptly. The machine is very plasticy and lightweight. (It's Nescafe predecessor was a solidly made machine). The instructions are less than clear and I only once managed to get a hot drink from it. There is no 'bin' provided to put the used pods in - a feature on the last one - and the mug rest is very small meaning any sizeable mug cannot be fitted either on the tray under the spout or on the space at the bottom. I am now in the process of seeking out a like for like replacement for my old machine which I will continue to use even though it sometimes piddles on the unit.
author: Scots Lass
date: Revisado en Reino Unido el 27 de enero de 2023

title: Looks good but...
body: Was well impressed with this coffee machine. But! Have only had this since September 2023. And it's started leaking, very disappointing. I wouldn't recommend this item.
author: Mrs. S. J. Roberts
date: Revisado en Reino Unido el 18 de octubre de 2023

title: Molto rumorosa
body:
Desideravo tantissimo la dolce gusto per poter provare tutte le bevande .
Ma la macchinetta é veramente rumorosa pensavo fosse difettata ma non é cosi ...
Usata un paio di mesi ma già accantonata anche perché per gusto personale non mi piace il sapore del caffè . Sembra il caffè solubile da barattolo .
author: Cliente Amazon
date: Revisado en Italia el 1 de septiembre de 2023

title: Failed after eight weeks.
body:
We bought this Krupa Dolce Gusto machine because we really like the Nescafé coffee pods. This is the third machine (Krups) that has failed prematurely and while the first two units have been returned for inspection (found not to be repairable and replaced with another lesser product), we have had to wait twelve and six weeks respectively and made numerous calls to them to find out what was happening.
This time the unit failed after eight weeks. We have spoken with Amazon Customer Service and they are kindly approving its return for a full credit. Now left with a dilemma as to what product to replace it with.
author: Peter Rice
date: Revisado en Reino Unido el 18 de julio de 2021

title: Nice looking but poorly made
body: Plastic water container is so thin think might break over time
author: ANDREW W
date: Revisado en Reino Unido el 14 de junio de 2021

title: Bien
body:
Reçus vite
La cafetière est très bien sauf petit réservoir et je préfère la toute première manuel quand meme
author: Client d'Amazon
date: Revisado en Francia el 26 de noviembre de 2021

title: Leaking machine
body: I was happy with this coffee machine when it first arrived however it started leaking one day from the base and has continued to do so for no apparent reason. Ideally I would like it replacing as I have had to stand it on on a tray to capture the water. I’m not sure if a replacement is possible after having it for a few months but it surely should not leak like this? I bought a new machine because my old three year old machine started leaking from the pod in various places. Now I appear to be back to square one with another leaking machine. Not happy!
author: Snoozecat
date: Revisado en Reino Unido el 25 de mayo de 2023

title: Not the best
body: After having manual coffee machines from the same range, decided to buy an automatic, the first one sent was returned as the capsule and water spike get not releasing properly. The second one which I have now had for a couple of months decides it is going to stop half way through the cycle and not fill the cup up to the pre-set level I have chosen. Also very messy when you have a mug on the lower level drip tray, splatters all over the work top unless you hold the mug up until there is a decent amount come through the machine which defeats the object of having the automatic coffee maker. Would not buy again but still it makes reasonable coffee
author: Jane H.
date: Revisado en Reino Unido el 14 de noviembre de 2022

title: Ease of use
body:
This appliance is not as good as the earlier model.
The water tank is not easy to handle and is large enough for only two standard cups.
The general feel is one of utility. Slow to fill the cup and generally lacking finesse.
Not what I expected.
author: Kenneth Jackson
date: Revisado en Reino Unido el 21 de marzo de 2023

title: Compact machine
body: Great little compact machine but why on earth did they put an orange cable on a white and black machine. Spoils the whole look of it.

date: Revisado en Reino Unido el 22 de febrero de 2023

title: Tallish late glasses do not fit
body: It's far too low for late glasses and I think they should warn you of this in the description

title: Doesn't come with pods
body: It doesn't come with pods and I have not used it yet.

date: Revisado en Reino Unido el 15 de enero de 2023

title: Could be better
body: I bought this to replace my old Dolce Gusto machine, thinking it was going to be a sturdier replacement - it's not. It has a much flimsier build and I don't anticipate it lasting much more than a year. The semi-automatic function is a neat addition, but I don't think it's worth paying so much extra for it. I certainly won't be replacing this one with another DG machine.

date: Revisado en Reino Unido el 26 de abril de 2021

title: Purtroppo reso!

title: Ótima cafeteira
body:
Já possuía essa cafeteira anteriormente sendo a segunda dolce gusto que compro, onde esse devido a operação toda digital é muito melhor e mais pratica que as manuais que possuem alavanca.
A opção de selecionar a temperatura é muito boa permitindo variar o modo de se consumir a mesma capsula e se adaptando melhor ao clima do dia.

title: Perfecta para cuando tengo invitados en casa

El precio de oferta estaba realmente bien.

body: Pour capuchino très bien. Par contre je remplis le réservoir , il y a de l'eau qui s'écoule d'en dessous.

date: Revisado en Francia el 29 de noviembre de 2023

title: Molto soddisfatta
body:
La macchina e' compatta e versatile, proprio come volevo, ma nonostante le piccole dimensioni fa tutto quello che deve.
Si scalda velocemente e il caffe e' caldo, buono (almeno a gusto mio e di chi lo ha provato) e si puo' scegliere tra moltissimi tipi e formati differenti.
Le cialde hanno un ottimo prezzo e si trovano sempre in offerta o su Amazon o nei vari negozi e supermercati.
A voler proprio trovare un difetto, mi pare un pochino "plasticosa" e mi riservo di vedere come si comportera' nel tempo, in termini di durabilita' e solidita'. C'è da dire che per 75€ il prodotto e' piu' che valido.
Un ottimo acquisto nel complesso, lo rifarei.
author: Elena
date: Revisado en Italia el 31 de enero de 2022

title: Instructions
body: It would be much more helpful if instructions could be in words not diagrams. I got my first DeLonghi Gusto machine today and I'm still trying to understand all the diagrams - I don't think I ever will!

date: Revisado en Reino Unido el 24 de octubre de 2023

title: Ok
body:
In general nice looking coffee machine, coffe is not as good as from a cafe where they have proper machines and use fresh milk and fresh coffee. But for the proce we can not expect more so worth it if you can not afford expensive real coffee machine.

The only thing I dont understand is why the water still l comes out HOT when I click the button for cold..
Just found out about it and no option to return it now. So check everything just after it arrives.

Descaling light is on but I had it for a short time and dont even drink coffe every single day.

title: Water tank not the biggest.
body: but other wise a good buy and the automatic setting for coffee and or milk is great.
author: J.Hoskins
date: Revisado en Reino Unido el 23 de agosto de 2023

title: Worth the money but could have larger tank
body: I love how compact this machine is, it fits really well in a small space in my kitchen. The tank can be fiddly to remove if you don’t leave enough space around the sides of the machine as it doesn’t have a handle like some of the Tassimo machines, but this is resolved by leaving a gap for your hands along the sides. The tank itself can produce about 3 mugs of coffee. I like the range of pods, definitely more than Tassimo offer and cheaper too. Also places like Aldi have their own compatible ranges. Well worth the money. The settings take a bit of getting used to as you use a dial too select how much/how hot the water is, but once you’ve figured this out is brilliant. I do like this feature as some people like their coffee boiling hot rather than instantly drinkable. Would recommend this machine only downside is the small tank size.
author: alexis101
date: Revisado en Reino Unido el 17 de mayo de 2021

title: Caffè troppo lungo
body: È una ottima macchina, oltre al caffè (unica pecca che spiegherò più avanti) ho provato ginseng, camomilla e cappuccino. Per quanto riguarda il difetto sul caffè è che io uso un bicchierino perché mi piace al vetro, con la macchina precedente si fermava a 3/4 o a metà, questa lo riempie e non c'è modo di interrompere l'erogazione. Se qualcuno ha un consiglio è ben accetto. In sostanza ottimo acquisto.
author: saccocci maurizio
date: Revisado en Italia el 22 de enero de 2023

title: Macchina ideale anche per …….
body: Macchina da caffè ideale anche per capsule “caffè Borbone”.

title: Coffee machine. De gusto
body: I found this very hard to use. The user manual is in French and although it is also in picture it is not very clear. It certainly has plenty of details but as usual there is nothing in English and most of the wording is so small it requires a magnifying glass to read. I have phoned the help line twice but they seem rather vague and not really helpful. The coffee is nice once you can get one but I wish I had looked around before buying this one.

date: Revisado en Reino Unido el 13 de enero de 2021

title: Lovely coffee machine
body: Arrived promptly as promised. Seems to make the coffee a little hotter than my previous machine. Bought the white version which looks nice and clean on the worktop. Easy to use, so no complaints from me.

date: Revisado en España el 29 de junio de 2024

title: Sencilla y robusta...y ¡guapa!.
body:
La he comprado para relevar, si llega el día en que deje de funcionar, a la que uso actualmente, que es idéntica a esta. Aunque no da señales de agotamiento, tras años de uso intenso en los que ha hecho muchos miles de cafés, quiero estar preparado. Por eso, creo estar en condiciones de hablar de este aparato, y mis comentarios solo pueden ser positivos.
Es muy sencilla, y ésta es, posiblemente, su mejor virtud. Se limpia muy fácilmente, aunque, es difícil que se ensucie solo con el uso.
Es fácil de descalcificar, y es la única precaución que se debe tener con ella.
author: Isidro Moreno Munera
date: Revisado en España el 3 de mayo de 2024

title: Buenísima
body: Muy buena maquina y escelentes café
author: Paqui
date: Revisado en España el 29 de mayo de 2024

title: Buenísimo 👏
body: El tamaño es muy práctico y muy fácil de usar, el café queda perfecto y rápido, tampoco hace ruido. 10/10!
author: Fernanda
date: Revisado en España el 7 de abril de 2024

title: Maravillosa cafetera para lo que vale y lo cómoda que es
body: Compré está cafetera para mí casa, porque la tenemos en el trabajo y la probé allí y me encantó. El café está bastante bueno teniendo en cuenta que no es una cafetera de estas más caras que hay moler y que sale el café buenisimo. Yo tengo una de estas también, pero a veces por no montar todo el lío, sacar el molinillo, moler y limpiarlo, lavar donde va la leche, limpiar el circuito...al final cada vez la usas menos por falta de tiempo y más incluso por pereza. Está cafetera de Nescafé sin embargo, te haces un café en cero coma, calienta el agua volando y en menos de dos minutos tienes ya un café muy decente. Y tienen una cantidad de variedad de sabores impresionante, es imposible que no encuentres alguno que te guste. Y la limpieza es super fácil. Yo estoy muy contenta con la compra!
author: Nasi
date: Revisado en España el 5 de abril de 2024

title: Muy buena
body: Buena calidad precio
author: José luis

title: Excelente Máquina de Café por um Ótimo Preço!
body:
A Dolce Gusto De'LSJFS Genio S EDG226.A superou todas as minhas expectativas, oferecendo uma experiência de café de alta qualidade a um preço acessível.

Qualidade do Café Impecável:
Esta máquina de café em cápsulas proporciona um café delicioso e consistente a cada utilização. Desde expressos intensos a cappuccinos cremosos, a qualidade do café é impressionante. A possibilidade de ajustar a intensidade da bebida permite adaptar o café ao meu gosto pessoal.

Facilidade de Utilização e Limpeza:
O design intuitivo e os controles simplificados tornam a operação desta máquina muito fácil. Preparar uma chávena de café tornou-se um processo rápido e sem complicações. Além disso, a limpeza é descomplicada, com peças removíveis que facilitam a manutenção regular.

Design Compacto e Funcional:
O design moderno e compacto da Genio S encaixa-se perfeitamente na minha cozinha. A funcionalidade é excelente, permitindo ajustar não apenas a intensidade, mas também o volume de água para diferentes tamanhos de chávenas.

Excelente Preço em Relação à Qualidade:
O preço que paguei, cerca de 75€, é excepcional considerando a qualidade do café e a funcionalidade da máquina. Esta compra é um verdadeiro investimento que elevou a minha experiência de café sem comprometer o orçamento.

Conclusão:
A Dolce Gusto De'LSJFS Genio S EDG226.A é uma máquina de café em cápsulas que oferece qualidade, conveniência e um excelente preço. Se procuras um café de qualidade barista em casa, sem gastar uma fortuna, esta é a escolha ideal. Recomendo totalmente esta máquina para todos os amantes de café que buscam um ótimo custo-benefício.

title: No te quejes tanto
body:
Es lo que es, una cafetera de cápsulas que te saca del paso. Si te da pereza hacer el cafe por las mañanas (o a cualquier hora del día), es tu maquina. Metes la cápsula, seleccionas la cantidad de agua, aprietas un botón y tienes cafe. Sin mas pretensiones.
Plásticos baratos, pero que esperas por ese precio? Acero inoxidable? Que hace ruido? Si, pero no vas a despertar al vecino del quinto.
Si me aguanta un año o dos, por 60€ me doy con un canto en los dientes.

date: Revisado en Francia el 26 de agosto de 2021

title: Does the job, without any problems.
body:
Had this a couple of weeks now and not had any problems. Was worried by some poor reviews talking about a ‘plasticy taste’ or leaks, but this was not my experience. I ran a tank of water through it first,as per the instructions, and every cup has been spot on since.

I got 3 different boxes of capsules to try and some are nicer than others. I’m not a fan of the powdered milk cappuccinos but the rest of the family really liked them (I got one of those electric frother ‘wand’ things and just make my own froth with milk zapped in the microwave for 1 min. Which everyone now prefers)

It’s really very simple and very clean to use. The water is very hard around here so I always use filtered water in it because everything gets scaled up really quickly in this house. The only negative is that you start to feel really guilty about all the plastic pods going into the bin by the end of the first week so I bought one of those reusable capsules (the metal type with a green lid) and fill that with my own ground coffee. Had it a few days now and I can report that it works perfectly, just adds a bit more faffing about to the process than the disposable capsules but it’s worth it for being guilt free and the fact I can use any coffee I like (I’ve just ordered two more of the reusable capsules so that all three of us can use them at the same time.)

When we moved into this a house a couple of years ago it came with an expensive Bosch coffee machine already installed in the fitted kitchen. We couldn't believe our luck and thought that was ‘the height of luxury’ but it turned out to be a nightmare, constantly needing to be repaired at an extortionate call out charge and the coffee it made was not that good and a bit of a faff to prepare (the steamer nozzle thing never properly worked). Contrast that overpriced junk with this inexpensive Dolce Gusto thingy and the is really no contest.
One of the better things I’ve bought in lockdown. It just works properly, every time.

title: Small, aesthetically pleasing, easy to use
body:
I started off with a Piccolo XS Dolce Gusto. I did regret buying that when I saw how much easier it was on other models to have the hot water on a timer and all you had to do was press the button and it stopped at the right time (the Piccolo you have to turn the lever on and off to start and stop your hot water)

I then treated myself to a Mini Me which was great but the water container at the back started to become quite hard to pull out - the seal got very tight. However, I really liked the coffees and I bought my auntie a Genio S. She needed something easy to use and also not too fiddly as she has arthritis in her hands. I was so impressed I immediately bought myself one.

The pros are:

* the size - it is really slim and can fit in anywhere without taking up much room. Also very light
* the water container lifts in and out very easily
* I love the dial to select the number of bars you need
* It holds comfortably enough water for three people to have a drink and its quite to top up and go again if you need to make more.
* the overall look is great

Cons

* I honestly can't think of any!

I'm very happy with my Genio S and my old one has now gone to work so all is well :)

title: Good replacement for a much loved Dolce Gusto machine
body: We have been using a De Longhi Melody 3 Dolce Gusto coffee maker for about ten years. We bought this to replace it after the pump failed (and before I figured out how to fix it) as the Genio S is the closest in functionality. It is smaller (more compact) but has essentially the same controls. It works really well and makes great coffee. The controls are slightly more fiddly - the "start" button requires quite a firm press and is made of soft plastic that feels like it might not last 10 years. The lever for pushing the water nozzle into the pods seems more flimsy but the action is actually easier and punctures the foil cap on the pods with less effort. The water container is also smaller, though plenty large enough for two large cups of coffee, but more difficult to re-attach than its predecessor. I always thought the Melody 3 was a very well made machine, and I think the Genio S has made some improvements and a couple of steps backwards. I can't see any reason to go for the higher spec Genio S + or Genio S Touch - overall this is a very good machine and very good value at the price we paid for it.
author: PhilG
date: Revisado en Reino Unido el 25 de junio de 2021

title: Great product - and superb aftercare support
body:
Bought this machine just under two years ago after disappointing experience with its main rival (first machine never worked, second died in first week of use). The Dolce Gusto is very simple to operate, gives excellent results and is in use every day.
Unfortunately, forgot that it should be de-scaled every three months, and we live in a particularly hard water area. Not surprisingly therefore that it eventually failed and I could not open the catch to remove the capsule. Contacted their Customer Engagement Services team and received excellent (and fast) support in terms of emailed advice to correct the problem. However no success - but they pointed out it had a 2 year warranty, and I had two weeks left. I sent a photo of the serial number/barcode and a new machine was on its way. Really first class service
author: Amazon Customer
date: Revisado en Reino Unido el 23 de febrero de 2023

title: Superior Coffee Experience with Compact Design
body: The De'Longhi Dolce Gusto EDG225.W Genio S Pod Coffee Machine delivers a high-quality, customizable coffee experience that users love. The compact design is a standout feature, with many buyers appreciating how it saves countertop space. Users laud the adjustable drink size feature for catering to different tastes, while the removable water tank is praised for its ease of cleaning and refilling. The machine's fast heating time is another feature that has garnered positive reviews. With its blend of convenience, customizability, and superior brewing capabilities, the De'Longhi Dolce Gusto Genio S Pod Coffee Machine has rightly earned a five-star rating.
author: Amazon Customer
date: Revisado en Reino Unido el 2 de junio de 2023

title: Quick and easy coffee you will enjoy
body:
Love this machine!! This one is so easy to use and looks fantastic in our kitchen. Just pick your coffee/latte/espresso/chocolate or cappuccino, select the proper water amount and press the but with the cup. You can see from the video that the machine is fast to get your coffee ready and heating up takes less than 30 seconds. The pods we tried so far are Starbucks espresso, Starbucks hot chocolate (chocochino) nespresso cappuccino and nespresso latte macchiato and they all taste very good, rich taste and not diluted or bland. The temperature is really good and hot.

The water container is perfect for serving up to four cups. Very easy to refill and place back into the machine. I have absolutely no issues with the pump as reported on other De Longhi nespresso dolce gusto machines. I did have problems with the Nespresso Dolce Gusto Jovia!!! It was broken as it arrived so I sent it back and bought this one instead. Even if it hadn’t been broken I’d send it back because it’s not automatic like this one. All in all GREAT coffee maker and I do recommend it!!!! Hope this review helps you answer the question whether to buy it or not!
author: Amar Jukic
date: Revisado en Reino Unido el 25 de diciembre de 2020

date: Revisado en Reino Unido el 12 de diciembre de 2023

title: Great Coffee Pod Machine
body: The De'Longhi Genio S Coffee Pod Machine looks good in our kitchen. We also have a second one, which we take with us on our travels. It is nice and compact, easy to use with adjustable settings for different sizes of cup. A great buy from Amazon, who take great care in the packaging of the products they send out for delivery.
author: Michael Spencer
date: Revisado en Reino Unido el 21 de mayo de 2023

title: Number Four
body:
A couple of years ago we bought our first Dolce Gusto coffee maker. £39 as a promotion with a set of coffee pods. We set it up and tried the americano, OMG because we are both coffee lovers we could not get enough. Long story short, we just bought our fourth machine a Dolce Gusto Genio s,
It is amazing, it's automatic and there is a setting for extra pods. I use that sometimes to get more coffee.
We have tried all the different coffees and sometimes it's hard to order more because they're all excellent.
When a coffee machine is at the end of its life we don't wait to get another one.
We worn the previous ones out never had a faulty one.
It's the best thing in the coffee world
author: Patrick.Steylaerts
date: Revisado en Reino Unido el 13 de abril de 2021

title: Quick coffee
body: I like that you can control the water exactly as the bars on the capsules My old one you just had to guess
author: Denise
date: Revisado en Reino Unido el 18 de septiembre de 2023

title: Very pleased
body: Had the previous version for 6 years. And updated to the digital version so pleased I did, so easy to use with the correct amount of water to the pod. Now the drinks tast better.
author: V CHIVERS
date: Revisado en Reino Unido el 14 de agosto de 2023

title: Dolce gusto automatic pod machine
body:
Already had pod machine but not automatic so decided to give this a shot. Not disappointed at all. We both are delighted with the upgrade.
Bought the white and black one, styled with red cable!
So easy to use as expected with xl feature an added bonus.
All in all we are hooked!!!!!
author: morag
date: Revisado en Reino Unido el 2 de mayo de 2023

title: Automatic so you don’t have to watch it
body:
Recently bought this model to replace a previous manual Dolce Gusto and can safely say that It’s money well spent.
The bonus of the automatic machines is that it puts the correct amount of coffee in per pod grades, just turn the dial to the correct grade and press the button and leave it to pour.
No more multitasking keeping an eye on the coffee pouring as you make a sandwich, just let it go safe knowing that it will cut off when it’s reached the level required.
Nice wee machine to have in the kitchen and quieter than my previous model.
Also benefitted from the additional offer of 6 free boxes of pods.
Highly recommend to all coffee lovers
author: Mr Dave
date: Revisado en Reino Unido el 12 de junio de 2021

title: Super item
body: Thank you
author: Super item
date: Revisado en Reino Unido el 10 de noviembre de 2023

title: The Simple AM/PM life
body: It works, it’s greatly improved my morning routine. Like coffee in a flash then this baby is ready to purchase in other colours as well as white.. love this item
author: 1/2pint68
date: Revisado en Reino Unido el 21 de julio de 2023

title: Superb coffee maker
body: Did a lot of review reading before choosing this machine and it is excellent - quick to heat up, very easy to use. One of the main benefits against other machines is that it turns off by itself once it has dispensed the amount of water you have set it to - something other models do not do. You can also top up the cup by using a lower setting without affecting taste - strength as I do like a big cup! No downsides. Highly recommended
author: Mr James Dalton
date: Revisado en Reino Unido el 21 de mayo de 2022

title: Good machine
body: Bought to replace another model with which I'd always had problems with the water tank being difficult to remove. This can be filled while in place but removed for washing. Difficult to fit a large mug on the tray as needs to be angled but generally does everything I need.
author: Brambles
date: Revisado en Reino Unido el 5 de abril de 2023
